info.author: Omar Ait Mous
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Interface for Python for the Linux (2.6.17+) splice and tee system calls
The splicetee module is an interface to the Linux splice() and tee() system calls from the Python programming language.

These system calls allow you to :

 * transfer data between two pipes without consuming the input.
 * move data from a stream to another without need for user-space involvment
   and with minimal (or no) copying.
info.name: splicetee
info.summary: A Python interface to splice and tee system calls.

Interface for Python for the Linux (2.6.17+) splice and tee system calls The splicetee module is an interface to the Linux splice() and tee() system calls from the Python programming language.

These system calls allow you to :
